channel.title: Where can i find servers IP address?
channel.description:
Hi When i download a private server and press 'Run.bat' it says
'Please enter IP address'
I know now that i have to enter the Servers IP address, but where can i find that IP address? :confused:
Some ppl say it is in the 'Client.java' folder in the files map, but i couldnt find it :(
Tnx ;)

item.title: Where can i find servers IP address?
item.dc:creator: @mikeomatic mikeomatic
item.description:
@mikeomatic wrote:

What do you mean

I want to know what an IP-Changing server is.

How it works and what IP i have to enter when i click Run.bat

I dont get it how all of you know how to play on servers like MithScape, i dont know how to enter that server

Thats what i want to know 2days searching no help yet[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2009, 01:13:20 pm[/size][hr]No one is going to help me :’(
Omg i want to play xD

I think IP changing server is a server that can load every server right?
If i enter something like mithscape.no-ip.biz (i dont know the real one) it might work
If i enter something like nubscape.no-ip.org it might work

is that right? then i just need to know the IP of a server to play ? ? but where is the IP i have to enter

Read full topic
